column2: The Crusade was a great success, but to whom shall I grant the lands I have gained?
The Crusade was a great success and now I must decide whether to request a fief in the captured lands for one of my relatives.
Request a fief for my son
Request a fief for my brother
Request a fief for a relative
No, our victory belongs to God
I have distributed fiefs in my new lands among the relatives of the Crusading lords.
A landless knight will become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! will become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
Might be granted a fief in the captured lands\n
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will relinquish [Root.GetHerHis] §Yprevious holdings§! and become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will be unable to §Ydeclare war§! or §Ybe declared on§! for ten years\n
